<Meta title="Styleguide/V4/Typography"/>

# Typography

Typography can help you create clear hierarchies, organize information, and guide users through a product or experience. Each page, modal pop-up, or widget must contain a title to structure the page. It is important to help users quickly identify where they are, and to introduce the subject of the page.

**Webkit-font-smoothing:**
The font-smoothing CSS property controls the application of anti-aliasing when fonts are rendered.
`font-smoothing: antialiased;`

To use our typography add in your *.scss
```css
  @import '~@ironsource/fusion-ui/style/v4/vars/fonts';
```
Or Import css file for *.css
```css
  @import '~@ironsource/fusion-ui/style/v4/fonts.css';
```

        <div class="fu-typeface-v4-col font-v4-body-1">12px</div>
        <div class="fu-typeface-v4-col font-v4-body-1">16px</div>
        <div class="fu-typeface-v4-col font-v4-body-1">---</div>
    </div>

    <div class="fu-typeface-v4-row">
        <div class="fu-typeface-v4-col font-v4-chart-1">chart1</div>

## Code example for CSS classes.
<Source code={`
<div class="font-v4-title">Title</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-1">Heading 1</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-2">Heading 2</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-3">Heading 3</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-4">Heading 4</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-5">Heading 5</div>
<div class="font-v4-heading-6">Heading 6</div>
<div class="font-v4-body-1">Body 1</div>
<div class="font-v4-body-2">Body 2</div>
<div class="font-v4-subtitle-1">Subtitle 1</div>
<div class="font-v4-subtitle-2">Subtitle 2</div>
<div class="font-v4-button">Button</div>
<div class="font-v4-overline">Overline</div>
<div class="font-v4-caption">Caption</div>
<div class="font-v4-table-header">Table header</div>
<div class="font-v4-chip-label">chip label</div>
<div class="font-v4-chart-1">Chart 1</div>
<div class="font-v4-chart-2">chart 2</div>
`} />

## Code example for SCSS.
<Source language="css" code={`
@import '~@ironsource/fusion-ui/style/v4/vars/fonts';

.font-v4-bold {@extend %font-v4-bold;}
.font-v4-semibold {@extend %font-v4-semibold; }
.font-v4-medium {@extend %font-v4-medium;}
.font-v4-regular {@extend %font-v4-regular;}
.font-v4-title {@extend %font-v4-title;}
.font-v4-heading-1 {@extend %font-v4-heading-1;}
.font-v4-heading-2 {@extend %font-v4-heading-2;}
.font-v4-heading-3 {@extend %font-v4-heading-3;}
.font-v4-heading-4 {@extend %font-v4-heading-4;}
.font-v4-heading-5 {@extend %font-v4-heading-5;}
.font-v4-heading-6 {@extend %font-v4-heading-6;}
.font-v4-body-1 {@extend %font-v4-body-1;}
.font-v4-body-2 {@extend %font-v4-body-2;}
.font-v4-subtitle-1 {@extend %font-v4-subtitle-1;}
.font-v4-subtitle-2 {@extend %font-v4-subtitle-2;}
.font-v4-chart-1 {@extend %font-v4-chart-1;}
.font-v4-chart-2 {@extend %font-v4-chart-2;}
.font-v4-button {@extend %font-v4-button;}
.font-v4-overline {@extend %font-v4-overline;}
.font-v4-caption {@extend %font-v4-caption;}
.font-v4-table-header {@extend %font-v4-table-header;}
.font-v4-input-label {@extend %font-v4-input-label;}
.font-v4-tab-label {@extend %font-v4-tab-label;}
.font-v4-chip-label {@extend %font-v4-chip-label;}
`} />
